topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1: Adding and removing users to a project

body.p: As an admin, you can add and remove user access to each project.

section.title: Add a user to a project

li.p: Launch the HPE Helion OpenStack Helion Dashboard.
Click the Projects link on the Admin dashboard Identity panel.
For the project you want to modify, click the Modify Users button.
On the Project Members tab of the Edit Project screen that displays, the users in the Project Members column can access and work with the current project.
Add a user to the project by clicking the + icon next to that user name in the All Users column.
The user name is added to the Project Members column and can now access the project.

section.title: Remove a user from a project

li.p: Launch the HPE Helion OpenStack Helion Dashboard.
Click the Projects link on the Admin dashboard Identity panel.
For the project you want to modify, click the Modify Users button.
On the Project Members tab of the Edit Project screen that displays, the users in the Project Members column can access and work with the current project.
To remove a user to the project, click the - icon next to that user name in the Project Members column.
The user name is moved to the **All Users** column and can no longer access the project.
